section.section: A majority of the authorized membership of the Commission is a quorum.
The Commission may not act unless a majority of the authorized membership concurs.

text.section: The Commission shall set the times and places of its meetings.

section.section:
The chairman of the Commission is entitled to:
an annual salary of $6,000; and
reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

Each other member of the Commission is entitled to:
an annual salary of $4,000; and
reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

text.section: While in office, each member of the Commission shall be covered by a surety bond in the form and amount required by law.
The Commission may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.
The Commission shall have its general offices in Baltimore City.
